attributes.action: Save the Therapeutic Community of Main House  from closure , and secure its future by changing it back to being centrally funded
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Main House is the only remaining fully residential Therapeutic Community in the country;it is a Tier 4 treatment centre for a very vulnerable group of patients , those with personality disorder ,which includes self harmers.Funding was changed to payment per case a couple of years ago , and the financial situation has , mainly as a direct result of this (there are other factors )led to the unit facing closure by the local Mental Health Trust,which says that it is putting other services in place;the danger is that if this unit were to close ,that these other services would not be suitable for the type of patient referred to Main House due to the intensive amount of psychological treatment that is needed.It is not clear either to the Community Mental Health Nurses where these services are to be located.
